attributes.action: The government should NOT invoke article 50 and should remain in the EU .
attributes.additional_details:
This proposal is based on the fact that the Brexit campaign and prominent supporters presented false information and propaganda. Misleading voters and removing their right to an informed choice. Many voters now regret their vote because, had they been in possession of the facts they would have chosen to vote remain.

Two documents concerning economic impact.
http://bit.ly/290eLw2
http://pwc.to/290ePMe

The Brexit campaign was full of false promises
http://cnet.co/293QIjz
http://bit.ly/290eCsI
attributes.background: The recent result in the UK referendum was not in fact a true reflection of the wishes of the majority of the British people on whether to leave the EU. It does not reflect the current wishes of the majority of the British people in light of post-referendum events.
